answers.answer: Yes!! 47 more days. We are almost there. Smiles!

Yes it is exciting  and nervous.  So far this  pregancy  has been better than mu first one. I had preeclampsia  , high blood pressure and protein  in my urine was admitted to the hospital for 2 weeks, she was born 20 days before. The  dr said o was in high risk again.  Hoping it doesnt happen again.  Hoping for the  best. 2more months ladies.
